# List All Ticket Comments

# Description

Uses the List Comments - GET
                API to retrieve the list of all comments on a ticket in Zendesk.

# Untitled Section

# Configuration

* 
* Ticket ID - The ID of the ticket. Start typing the subject of the ticket to retrieve records. This field supports Int64 type input.
* Sort Order - The order in which the results should be sorted, in asc or desc format. Default value is asc.









* Ticket comments - The list of ticket comments. Automatically generated output variable.
